Title: dateTimeToSnowflake
Description:
DangerThis function is deprecated and can only be used if setting allow_deprecated_snowflake_conversion_functions is enabled.
The function will be removed at some point in future.
Converts a DateTime value to the first Snowflake ID at the giving time.
Input value converted to the Int64 data type as the first Snowflake ID at that time.
Examples: WITH toDateTime('2021-08-15 18:57:56', 'Asia/Shanghai') AS dt SELECT dateTimeToSnowflake(dt);
